original_file: 待处理知识库\SRMS Support\更改同步至SPS临时表的Accounting Date.docx

qa_pairs.question: 相关问题
qa_pairs.answer:
文档来源：更改同步至SPS临时表的Accounting Date

查询需要更新的数据
SELECT
*
--	BUSINESS_UNIT,TRANSACTION_ID,TRANSACTION_LINE,ACCOUNTING_DT,FISCAL_YEAR,ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,JOURNAL_ID,JOURNAL_DATE,ACCOUNT,OPERATING_UNIT,CHARTFIELD1,MONETARY_AMOUNT,LINE_DESCR,CURRENCY_CD
FROM
PS_JGEN_ACCT_ENTRY(nolock)
WHERE
BUSINESS_UNIT = '50348'
--and MONETARY_AMOUNT TJ 54020
and LINE_DESCR = 'KA714920'
执行更新
update PS_JGEN_ACCT_ENTRY set ACCOUNTING_DT = '20241215' where BUSINESS_UNIT = '70155' and LINE_DESCR = 'SU718831'
qa_pairs.source: 文档来源：更改同步至SPS临时表的Accounting Date

sections.content:
查询需要更新的数据
SELECT
*
--	BUSINESS_UNIT,TRANSACTION_ID,TRANSACTION_LINE,ACCOUNTING_DT,FISCAL_YEAR,ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,JOURNAL_ID,JOURNAL_DATE,ACCOUNT,OPERATING_UNIT,CHARTFIELD1,MONETARY_AMOUNT,LINE_DESCR,CURRENCY_CD
FROM
PS_JGEN_ACCT_ENTRY(nolock)
WHERE
BUSINESS_UNIT = '50348'
--and MONETARY_AMOUNT TJ 54020
and LINE_DESCR = 'KA714920'
执行更新
update PS_JGEN_ACCT_ENTRY set ACCOUNTING_DT = '20241215' where BUSINESS_UNIT = '70155' and LINE_DESCR = 'SU718831'
